menu.title: Fitness menu
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. For people who are interested in sports; active and healthy. This is a completely new product with the best price and high quality!

menu.title: Premium menu
menu.descr: The Premium menu - we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - a restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!

menu.title: Lenten menu
menu.descr: Our special Lenten menu is a careful selection of ingredients: a complete absence of animal products. Complete harmony with yourself and nature in every element!
